question: Biodiversity refers to the variety of ________ on Earth.
The three levels of biodiversity are genetic, ________, and ecosystem biodiversity.
Genetic biodiversity refers to variations within a ________.
A region with a high number of different species has high ________ biodiversity.
The Amazon rainforest is an example of an ecosystem with ________ biodiversity.
The Sahara Desert has relatively ________ biodiversity due to its extreme conditions.
Biodiversity provides economic value through industries such as ________.
The ethical value of biodiversity suggests that all species have the ________ to exist.
Habitat destruction is a major cause of biodiversity ________.
The introduction of non-native species can lead to biodiversity ________.
